Name: Witch Schools: Love Potions
About the game: You are fabulously lucky! Or is it magical? Or even magically? You have a chance to get into a boarding school for future witches! Together with Tanya, the main character of the game “Witch school: Love Potion”, you will have to go to lectures, do homework, find a common language with your roommate and create real magic! And also to arrange parties, run on dates and try not to let the strict headmistress find out about it. 'Witch school: Love Potion” is a jigsaw puzzle based on the well-known “tag” and “Match 3'. Move objects, collect their rows and don't forget to keep track of the number of remaining moves! More elixirs - more magic! In the game “Witch school: Love Potion' you are waiting for: Magic School Cute witches More than forty puzzling levels A bunch of achievements Witchcraft and wizardry ...and a strict, very strict headmistress. If you know what I mean ;)
